name: Genesis Seed
description:
*** uploaded v.137 which should be a better gameplay experience, original jam version kept for posterity* 

Controls:

x- attack/ interact

z- cancel

space/enter pause

Play as Ren, a prodigy magi-hacker in this verdant sci-fantasy adventure. Brought back to life by the Mushroom Witch after a fatal misstep in your last mission, you are now tasked with delving into the secrets of Ark Oasis, an ancient lab that hides knowledge about the underpinnings of this world. Battle organitech monsters with strength you've developed by cultivating your Mind Garden, a mystical skill tree that is propagated via magi-seeds you collect on you journey. 

( As jams often go, everything takes more time than you thought and stuff you've already done decides to break : D just enjoy trimming the monster weeds!) 

Thanks for playing!

programming: Derek Reaves

sound: Rai Huillo

concept: Grey

animation: Bradley Klein, Kasumi

art: Christopher Pariano
